content: yarn onto needles dividing evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 pick up 2 additional sts per needle at base of thumb to close the gap 16 sts pm to indicate the beginning of round and join yarn knit for 8 rounds work twisted rib k1tbl p1 for 3 rounds bind off loosely weave in ends block and enjoy 3 lace chart chart is worked from bottom to top all rounds worked from right to left 4 written instructions for chart row 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 2 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k2tog k x 1 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 cdd k x 1 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 ssk p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 3 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 4 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 5 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 6 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 1 yo k x 1 cdd k x 1 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 cdd k x 1 yo k x 1 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 7 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 8 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 9 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 10 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k2tog k x 1 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 cdd k x 1 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 ssk p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 11 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 12 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 13 p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 row 13 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k1tbl p x 1 k
